dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Portrait Afterimage Sighting​</line-height>
dataList.desc: If a Skill Slot is attached to the Master's Portrait, a shockwave in the same color as the aura around the Master's Portrait occurs when the Portrait is revealed

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Throwing Out the Interloper​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
When the Portraits are present:
- Turn End: Once 3 turns have passed since the Portraits have appeared...
     - Inflict [UninvitedGuest] to the earliest-Deployed enemy without [UninvitedGuest]
     - Incinerate all Portraits. Inflict double the amount of fake Portraits burned as [Sinking] Potency and Count against all enemies. Gain [AttackUp] and [Protection] next turn

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Interloper Hunt​</line-height>
dataList.desc: If the target has [UninvitedGuest], Clash Power +1 and deal +20% more damage

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Ooh, Dear Master...​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
When the Portraits are present, reduce Affinity & Attack Type Resistances by 0.5, and gain 8 [Protection].
If the enemies defeated the Master's Portrait, inflict [UninvitedGuest] to the unit that defeated it; then gain 0.5 Phys. Resistances and 5 Fragile for the next turn.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>You Must Be the Interloper's Family?​</line-height>
dataList.desc: When an enemy has [UninvitedGuest], inflict [UninvitedGuest] against an enemy without [UninvitedGuest] every time this unit loses 10% of its HP (max 4 enemies)

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Peering Gaze​</line-height>
dataList.desc: As long as this unit exists, inflict 1 [Sinking] Potency and Count every turn

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Interloper​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
When this unit is defeated, inflict [UninvitedGuest] against the enemy that attacked this unit last
- If 4+ enemies have [UninvitedGuest], this effect does not activate

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Peering Gaze​</line-height>
dataList.desc: As long as this unit exists, inflict 1 [Sinking] Potency and Count every turn

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Interloper​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
When this unit is defeated, inflict [UninvitedGuest] against the enemy that attacked this unit last
- If 4+ enemies have [UninvitedGuest], this effect does not activate

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>A Familiar Connector​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
For every [ConnectedPlug], gain 1 Min. Speed value, 1 [Vulnerable], and 1 [AttackDmgUp]
When this unit is Staggered next turn due to having 3 [ConnectedPlug], gain 4 [Vulnerable]

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Overcurrent​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Turn End: For every 10 [Charge] Count on self, gain 1 [VioletDamageUp] next turn (max 2)

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Want to be Free​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
At 25% HP, starting this turn, gain 1 of the following every turn. The values are cumulative and do not expire.
- Gain 1 [ParryingResultUp]
- Gain 1 [AttackDmgUp]
- Gain 1 [Vulnerable]

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Generator​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Turn End: If this unit does not have [ConnectedPlug] and [ThundercloudFormation], summon a Generator once next turn.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Gathering Lightning Cloud​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Turn End: Apply 4 [ThundercloudFormation] to the Dreaming Electric Sheep next turn.
Does not apply more of this effect if it already has this effect.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Detached Anti-Ovine Grounding Plug​</line-height>
dataList.desc: When hit, inflict 1 [AntiSheepGround] to the Attacker (once per turn)

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Safety Plug​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Reduces all damage taken to 0

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Prelude of the Banquet​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Turn 2 Start: Summon the retinue of the King in Binds.
The King has twelve retainers. Upon the death of a retainer, another will fill its place until there are none.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Closing of the Banquet​</line-height>
dataList.desc: When all retainers are defeated, the King joins the fight.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>NOTHING TO SEE HERE​</line-height>
dataList.desc: NOTHING TO SEE HERE

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Snapping Bandages​</line-height>
dataList.desc: When the Body Part is destroyed, apply [BandageOfTheBoundKing] on all enemies.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Retainer of the King in Binds​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
- Gain [BandageOfTheBoundKing] and [BigWelcome] for this Encounter.
- At every Turn Start, the King in Binds blesses this unit with grace.
- The grace of the King in Binds changes every turn, in the following order: [Enhancement], SP Heal, and HP Heal. If there are less than 6 surviving Retainers(Peccatulum Invidiae), boost the grace's strength.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>NOTHING TO SEE HERE​</line-height>
dataList.desc: NOTHING TO SEE HERE

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>LOOK AWAY!​</line-height>
dataList.desc: LOOK AWAY!

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Refracted Struggle​</line-height>
dataList.desc: At 10+ Clashes against the same enemy, randomly gain or lose Clash Power by (Clash Count / 10) in a Clash. (rounded down)

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Peccatulum Invidiae Class 2​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Deal +15% damage and take -15% damage

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Refracted Mind​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Entry SP +30

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Refracted Mind​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Entry SP -20

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Refracted Mind​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Entry SP +45

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Refracted Mind​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Entry SP +20
